taxon_identification.taxon_hierarchy: family rosaceae;tribe rubeae;genus rubus;subgenus eubatus;section flagellares;species temerarius;

treatment.description: Similar to no. 25 but pedicels essentially glabrous; leaflets coarsely dentate, merely acute; primocane-leaflets broadly ovate, the terminal leaflet broadly subtruncate or subcordate at base, the petiole with numerous acicular prickles; axis of flowering branchlet pilose; leaflets mostly elliptic; erect glabrous but bristly pedicels about 5 cm. long.
